Name: Epsilon
About the game: Epsilon is a hybrid stealth-action near-future tactical shooter where pre-planning and commanding your squad is essential for survival. Through high intensity kinetic operations, Epsilon is the unit tasked by Unipol to counter Eastern European militias engaged in human trafficking.
Meta Title: Epsilon: Oct 1, 2015, Serellan LLC and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Epsilon? Check out the release date (Oct 1, 2015), developer insights from Serellan LLC, and a complete game summary.
